elements.name: As a user I want to verify that the city
elements.description: Frankfurt is in Germany and return their corresponded latitude and longitude

steps.name: user sends get request to endpoint
verify that respond status code is 200 and content-type is "application/json"

verify latitude and longitude of the city

name: As a biker I would like to know the exact location of city bikes around the world in a given application.
